query.statement:
SELECT A.VKBUR, A.VKBUR_NM, A.VKGRP, A.VKGRP_NM, A.ZMAN, A.ZMAN_NM, A.KUNNR_NM, A.ZSITE_NM, A.PSPID, A.BSTDK, A.VDATU, CASE WHEN A.CLDATE1_A = '99999999' THEN (CASE WHEN A.CLDATE_A = '99999999' THEN '' ELSE A.CLDATE_A END) ELSE A.CLDATE1_A END CLDATE_A, CASE WHEN A.CLDATE1_E = '' THEN A.CLDATE_E ELSE A.CLDATE1_E END CLDATE_E, A.EL, A.ES, A.WW, A.JJ, A.FF, A.GG, A.TT, A.YY, A.CAN, A.YCAN, A.SUJU, A.MECHUL, A.CHUNG, A.MICH, A.SUGM, A.MISU, A.GONG_0, A.GONG_1, A.GONG_R1, A.GONG_2, A.GONG_R2, A.GONG_3, A.SUGM_R, CASE WHEN A.VDA <> '00000000' THEN SAPHEE.MONTH_BETWEEN(A.VDA,CAST(#GIJUN# AS VARCHAR(8)),'1') ELSE 0 END VDA, A.NAB_T, A.QTY_A, A.JAN_A, A.QTY_B, A.JAN_B, A.QTY_C, A.JAN_C, A.QTY_D, A.JAN_D, A.QTY_A1, A.JAN_A1, CASE WHEN A.DAT_A1 IN ('00000000','99999999') THEN '' ELSE A.DAT_A1 END DAT_A1, A.MON_A1, A.QTY_A2, A.JAN_A2, CASE WHEN A.DAT_A2 IN ('00000000','99999999') THEN '' ELSE A.DAT_A2 END DAT_A2, A.MON_A2, A.QTY_B1, A.JAN_B1, CASE WHEN A.DAT_B1 IN ('00000000','99999999') THEN '' ELSE A.DAT_B1 END DAT_B1, A.MON_B1, A.QTY_B2, A.JAN_B2, CASE WHEN A.DAT_B2 IN ('00000000','99999999') THEN '' ELSE A.DAT_B2 END DAT_B2, A.MON_B2, A.QTY_B3, A.JAN_B3, CASE WHEN A.DAT_B3 IN ('00000000','99999999') THEN '' ELSE A.DAT_B3 END DAT_B3, A.MON_B3, A.QTY_C1, A.JAN_C1, CASE WHEN A.DAT_C1 IN ('00000000','99999999') THEN '' ELSE A.DAT_C1 END DAT_C1, A.MON_C1, A.QTY_C2, A.JAN_C2, CASE WHEN A.DAT_C2 IN ('00000000','99999999') THEN '' ELSE A.DAT_C2 END DAT_C2, A.MON_C2, A.QTY_C3, A.JAN_C3, CASE WHEN A.DAT_C3 IN ('00000000','99999999') THEN '' ELSE A.DAT_C3 END DAT_C3, A.MON_C3 FROM ( SELECT MAX(A.VKBUR) VKBUR, MAX(A.VKBUR_NM) VKBUR_NM, MAX(A.VKGRP) VKGRP, MAX(A.VKGRP_NM) VKGRP_NM, MAX(A.ZMAN) ZMAN, MAX(A.ZMAN_NM) ZMAN_NM, MAX(A.KUNNR_NM) KUNNR_NM, MAX(A.ZSITE_NM) ZSITE_NM, A.PSPID, MAX(A.BSTDK) BSTDK, MAX(A.VDATU) VDATU, MIN(VALUE(C.ILDAT,'99999999')) CLDATE_A, MAX(VALUE(D.ILDAT,'')) CLDATE_E, MIN(VALUE(C1.ILDAT,'99999999')) CLDATE1_A, MAX(VALUE(D1.ILDAT,'')) CLDATE1_E, SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(A.POSID,7,1) = 'L' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) EL, SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(A.POSID,7,1) = 'S' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) ES, SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(A.POSID,7,1) = 'W' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) WW, SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(A.POSID,7,1) = 'J' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) JJ, SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(A.POSID,7,1) = 'F' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) FF, SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(A.POSID,7,1) = 'G' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) GG, SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(A.POSID,7,1) = 'T' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) TT, SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(A.POSID,7,1) = 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) YY, SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(A.POSID,7,1) NOT IN ('T','Y') AND B.TXT04 IN ('C','Z') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) CAN, SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(A.POSID,7,1) NOT IN ('T','Y') AND B.TXT04 = 'R7' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) YCAN, SUM(A.SUJU*100) SUJU, SUM(A.MECHUL*100) MECHUL, SUM(A.CHEONG*100) CHUNG, SUM(A.MICH*100) MICH, SUM(A.SUKEUM*100) SUGM, SUM(A.MISU*100) MISU, SUM(CASE WHEN A.PRO_R = 0 AND SUBSTR(A.POSID,7,1) NOT IN ('T','Y') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) GONG_0, SUM(CASE WHEN A.PRO_R BETWEEN 1 AND 89.9 AND SUBSTR(A.POSID,7,1) NOT IN ('T','Y') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) GONG_1, CASE WHEN SUM(CASE WHEN A.PRO_R BETWEEN 1 AND 89.9 AND SUBSTR(A.POSID,7,1) NOT IN ('T','Y')THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) <> 0 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN A.PRO_R BETWEEN 1 AND 89.9 AND SUBSTR(A.POSID,7,1) NOT IN ('T','Y') THEN A.PRO_R ELSE 0 END) /SUM(CASE WHEN A.PRO_R BETWEEN 1 AND 89.9 AND SUBSTR(A.POSID,7,1) NOT IN ('T','Y') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) ELSE 0 END GONG_R1, SUM(CASE WHEN A.PRO_R BETWEEN 90 AND 99.9 AND SUBSTR(A.POSID,7,1) NOT IN ('T','Y') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) GONG_2, CASE WHEN SUM(CASE WHEN A.PRO_R BETWEEN 90 AND 99.9 AND SUBSTR(A.POSID,7,1) NOT IN ('T','Y') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) <> 0 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN A.PRO_R BETWEEN 90 AND 99.9 AND SUBSTR(A.POSID,7,1) NOT IN ('T','Y') THEN A.PRO_R ELSE 0 END) /SUM(CASE WHEN A.PRO_R BETWEEN 90 AND 99.9 AND SUBSTR(A.POSID,7,1) NOT IN ('T','Y') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) ELSE 0 END GONG_R2, SUM(CASE WHEN A.PRO_R = 100 AND SUBSTR(A.POSID,7,1) NOT IN ('T','Y')THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) GONG_3, ROUND(CASE WHEN SUM(A.SUJU) <> 0 THEN FLOAT(SUM(A.SUKEUM))/FLOAT(SUM(A.SUJU))*100 ELSE 0 END,0) SUGM_R, MAX(CASE WHEN A.VDATU < #GIJUN# THEN A.VDATU ELSE '00000000' END) VDA, MAX(CASE WHEN A.VDATU < #GIJUN# AND A.MISU > 0 AND (A.ZZCOMP2 = '00000000' OR A.ZZCOMP2 > #GIJUN# OR A.ZZJUNGO = '') THEN '³³°æ¹Ì' ELSE '' END) NAB_T, SUM(CASE WHEN GBN = 'A' AND GUBUNA = 'A' AND SUBSTR(A.POSID,7,1) NOT IN ('T','Y') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) QTY_A, SUM(CASE WHEN GBN = 'A' AND GUBUNA = 'A' THEN A.JANEW*100 ELSE 0 END) JAN_A, SUM(CASE WHEN GBN = 'A' AND GUBUNA = 'B' AND SUBSTR(A.POSID,7,1) NOT IN ('T','Y') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) QTY_B, SUM(CASE WHEN GBN = 'A' AND GUBUNA = 'B' THEN A.JANEW*100 ELSE 0 END) JAN_B, SUM(CASE WHEN GBN = 'A' AND GUBUNA = 'C' AND SUBSTR(A.POSID,7,1) NOT IN ('T','Y') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) QTY_C, SUM(CASE WHEN GBN = 'A' AND GUBUNA = 'C' THEN A.JANEW*100 ELSE 0 END) JAN_C, SUM(CASE WHEN GBN = 'A' AND GUBUNA >= 'D' AND SUBSTR(A.POSID,7,1) NOT IN ('T','Y') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) QTY_D, SUM(CASE WHEN GBN = 'A' AND GUBUNA >= 'D' THEN A.JANEW*100 ELSE 0 END) JAN_D, SUM(CASE WHEN GBN = 'A' AND GUBUNA = 'A' AND GUBUNB = 'A0100' AND SUBSTR(A.POSID,7,1) NOT IN ('T','Y') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) QTY_A1, SUM(CASE WHEN GBN = 'A' AND GUBUNA = 'A' AND GUBUNB = 'A0100' THEN A.JANEW*100 ELSE 0 END) JAN_A1, MAX(CASE WHEN GBN = 'A' AND GUBUNA = 'A' AND GUBUNB = 'A0100' THEN A.VDATU ELSE '00000000' END) DAT_A1, MAX(CASE WHEN GBN = 'A' AND GUBUNA = 'A' AND GUBUNB = 'A0100' AND SUBSTR(A.POSID,7,1) NOT IN ('T','Y') THEN A.AGING ELSE 0 END) MON_A1, SUM(CASE WHEN GBN = 'A' AND GUBUNA = 'A' AND GUBUNB = 'A0200' AND SUBSTR(A.POSID,7,1) NOT IN ('T','Y') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) QTY_A2, SUM(CASE WHEN GBN = 'A' AND GUBUNA = 'A' AND GUBUNB = 'A0200' THEN A.JANEW*100 ELSE 0 END) JAN_A2, MAX(CASE WHEN GBN = 'A' AND GUBUNA = 'A' AND GUBUNB = 'A0200' THEN A.VDATU ELSE '00000000' END) DAT_A2, MIN(CASE WHEN GBN = 'A' AND GUBUNA = 'A' AND GUBUNB = 'A0200' AND SUBSTR(A.POSID,7,1) NOT IN ('T','Y') THEN A.AGING ELSE 0 END) MON_A2, SUM(CASE WHEN GBN = 'A' AND GUBUNA = 'B' AND GUBUNB = 'B0100' AND SUBSTR(A.POSID,7,1) NOT IN ('T','Y') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) QTY_B1, SUM(CASE WHEN GBN = 'A' AND GUBUNA = 'B' AND GUBUNB = 'B0100' THEN A.JANEW*100 ELSE 0 END) JAN_B1, MAX(CASE WHEN GBN = 'A' AND GUBUNA = 'B' AND GUBUNB = 'B0100' THEN A.CLDATE1 ELSE '00000000' END) DAT_B1, MIN(CASE WHEN GBN = 'A' AND GUBUNA = 'B' AND GUBUNB = 'B0100' AND SUBSTR(A.POSID,7,1) NOT IN ('T','Y') THEN A.AGING ELSE 0 END) MON_B1, SUM(CASE WHEN GBN = 'A' AND GUBUNA = 'B' AND GUBUNB = 'B0200' AND SUBSTR(A.POSID,7,1) NOT IN ('T','Y') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) QTY_B2, SUM(CASE WHEN GBN = 'A' AND GUBUNA = 'B' AND GUBUNB = 'B0200' THEN A.JANEW*100 ELSE 0 END) JAN_B2, MAX(CASE WHEN GBN = 'A' AND GUBUNA = 'B' AND GUBUNB = 'B0200' THEN A.SSSTOP ELSE '00000000' END) DAT_B2, MIN(CASE WHEN GBN = 'A' AND GUBUNA = 'B' AND GUBUNB = 'B0200' AND SUBSTR(A.POSID,7,1) NOT IN ('T','Y') THEN A.AGING ELSE 0 END) MON_B2, SUM(CASE WHEN GBN = 'A' AND GUBUNA = 'B' AND GUBUNB = 'B0300' AND SUBSTR(A.POSID,7,1) NOT IN ('T','Y') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) QTY_B3, SUM(CASE WHEN GBN = 'A' AND GUBUNA = 'B' AND GUBUNB = 'B0300' THEN A.JANEW*100 ELSE 0 END) JAN_B3, MAX(CASE WHEN GBN = 'A' AND GUBUNA = 'B' AND GUBUNB = 'B0300' THEN A.SSDATE ELSE '00000000' END) DAT_B3, MIN(CASE WHEN GBN = 'A' AND GUBUNA = 'B' AND GUBUNB = 'B0300' AND SUBSTR(A.POSID,7,1) NOT IN ('T','Y') THEN A.AGING ELSE 0 END) MON_B3, SUM(CASE WHEN GBN = 'A' AND GUBUNA = 'C' AND GUBUNB = 'C0100' AND SUBSTR(A.POSID,7,1) NOT IN ('T','Y') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) QTY_C1, SUM(CASE WHEN GBN = 'A' AND GUBUNA = 'C' AND GUBUNB = 'C0100' THEN A.JANEW*100 ELSE 0 END) JAN_C1, MAX(CASE WHEN GBN = 'A' AND GUBUNA = 'C' AND GUBUNB = 'C0100' THEN A.ZZSHIP1 ELSE '00000000' END) DAT_C1, MIN(CASE WHEN GBN = 'A' AND GUBUNA = 'C' AND GUBUNB = 'C0100' AND SUBSTR(A.POSID,7,1) NOT IN ('T','Y') THEN A.AGING ELSE 0 END) MON_C1, SUM(CASE WHEN GBN = 'A' AND GUBUNA = 'C' AND GUBUNB = 'C0200' AND SUBSTR(A.POSID,7,1) NOT IN ('T','Y') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) QTY_C2, SUM(CASE WHEN GBN = 'A' AND GUBUNA = 'C' AND GUBUNB = 'C0200' THEN A.JANEW*100 ELSE 0 END) JAN_C2, MAX(CASE WHEN GBN = 'A' AND GUBUNA = 'C' AND GUBUNB = 'C0200' THEN A.MIDATE ELSE '00000000' END) DAT_C2, MIN(CASE WHEN GBN = 'A' AND GUBUNA = 'C' AND GUBUNB = 'C0200' AND SUBSTR(A.POSID,7,1) NOT IN ('T','Y') THEN A.AGING ELSE 0 END) MON_C2, SUM(CASE WHEN GBN = 'A' AND GUBUNA = 'C' AND GUBUNB = 'C0300' AND SUBSTR(A.POSID,7,1) NOT IN ('T','Y') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) QTY_C3, SUM(CASE WHEN GBN = 'A' AND GUBUNA = 'C' AND GUBUNB = 'C0300' THEN A.JANEW*100 ELSE 0 END) JAN_C3, MAX(CASE WHEN GBN = 'A' AND GUBUNA = 'C' AND GUBUNB = 'C0300' THEN A.ZZCOMP2 ELSE '00000000' END) DAT_C3, MIN(CASE WHEN GBN = 'A' AND GUBUNA = 'C' AND GUBUNB = 'C0300' AND SUBSTR(A.POSID,7,1) NOT IN ('T','Y') THEN A.AGING ELSE 0 END) MON_C3 FROM SAPHEE.ZEIST200 A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.PSPID = B.POSID AND A.POSID = B.POSID_1 LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPPT027 C ON A.MANDT = C.MANDT AND A.PSPID = C.PSPID AND A.POSID = C.POSID AND C.BLOCK = 'A' AND C.ACTIV = '05' AND C.GUBUN = '01' AND C.ILDAT > '' AND C.ILDAT > '00000000' LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPPT027 D ON A.MANDT = D.MANDT AND A.PSPID = D.PSPID AND A.POSID = D.POSID AND D.BLOCK = 'E' AND D.ACTIV = '05' AND D.GUBUN = '01' AND D.ILDAT > '' AND D.ILDAT > '00000000' LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPPT027 C1 ON A.MANDT = C1.MANDT AND A.PSPID = C1.PSPID AND A.POSID = C1.POSID AND C1.BLOCK = 'A' AND C1.ACTIV = '05' AND C1.GUBUN = '02' AND C1.ILDAT > '' AND C1.ILDAT > '00000000' LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPPT027 D1 ON A.MANDT = D1.MANDT AND A.PSPID = D1.PSPID AND A.POSID = D1.POSID AND D1.BLOCK = 'E' AND D1.ACTIV = '05' AND D1.GUBUN = '02' AND D1.ILDAT > '' AND D1.ILDAT > '00000000' WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.GUBUNA <> 'Z'
AND A.GBN = #GBN#
GROUP BY A.PSPID ORDER BY 1,3,5,9 ) A WITH UR
